text: Badal is a village in the Charkhi Dadri district of the Indian state of Haryana. Located in Charkhi Dadri tehsil, it lies south of the district headquarters in Charkhi Dadri on the western border with the Jhajjar district. , the village had 372 households with a total population of 1,903 of which 1,043 were male and 860 female. ==References== Category:Villages in Charkhi Dadri district
title: Badal, Bhiwani
